trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZA011_04190_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Boragchin eyes you with a calculating look.
TEXT_AKTKZA011_04190_TODO_00<tab>Place the slabs of raw meat.
TEXT_AKTKZA011_04190_BORAGCHIN_000_000<tab>You have an air of dangerous competence, and you are most certainly <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> Sharlayan. Yes...yes, you should do nicely!
TEXT_AKTKZA011_04190_BORAGCHIN_000_001<tab>For what, you may ask? As the overseer of the wildlife in this sector, I often find myself in need of new volunteers to help with the feeding.

TEXT_AKTKZA011_04190_BORAGCHIN_000_002<tab>While I am perfectly content to perform the task myself, it would be, ahem, <var 1A 02 /var>unwise<var 1A 01 /var> to allow the carnivores to grow too accustomed to my scent─or that of any of my colleagues, for that matter.

TEXT_AKTKZA011_04190_BORAGCHIN_000_003<tab>Which is why I am pleased to encounter “fresh meat” like you, if you'll excuse the phrase. So! What say you to a brief foray into the forest? You will be provided with suitable recompense, of course.
TEXT_AKTKZA011_04190_BORAGCHIN_000_004<tab>Wonderful! Here, take these hunks of raw flesh and just set them down at these locations. Hurry back as soon as you're done!
TEXT_AKTKZA011_04190_BORAGCHIN_000_005<tab>Once you've placed the meat, I don't suggest you tarry in the area...unless you wish to be mistaken for the main course!

TEXT_AKTKZA011_04190_BORAGCHIN_000_010<tab>Look at you─all finished, and with a distinct lack of bleeding and sobbing! This is why I prefer to employ mercenary types to feed our more aggressive specimens.
TEXT_AKTKZA011_04190_BORAGCHIN_000_011<tab>Fortunately, I can simply let the carnivores hunt down their own meals much of the time. But this is a closed habitat...

TEXT_AKTKZA011_04190_BORAGCHIN_000_012<tab>If we don't intervene to fill bellies on occasion, the delicate equilibrium between predator and prey will all come crashing down. Thank you for helping to maintain that balance.
